Headline: Temporary #66 Westbound Reroute near Chicago/Monticello
ShortDescription: 66 Westbound buses are temporarily rerouted via  Chicago, Homan, Augusta, Pulaski and return to Chicago near Chicago/Monticello.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Westbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Homan, Augusta, Pulaski and return to Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Monticello.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
